description:
12 gauge, serial #5654; double barrel shot gun; barrels are black in color; neck is wood; wood under barrels has finely carved crosshatch design; metal of trigger plate has carved floral motif; crosshatching on neck; butt is covered in black leather-like material; accompanied by leather case 9 x 32 x 3 inches. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
title: Side by Side Double Shotgun with Case
